ovdesc.p: AM.GROUP.PORT.CONCAT file stores the list of portfolio's that comes belongs to different groups present in AM.GROUP.PORT Application.
This file is updated automatically during the Batch process for all the groups present in AM.GROUP.PORT which are NOT deactivated (Field DEACTIVATED set to NO).

desc.p: A list of portfolios that belong to this group.
Must be a valid record in SEC.ACC.MASTER table.
